00038 #include <limits.h>
00039 #include <mpi.h>

00054 #define MAX_PROCESSES 8
00055 
00056 int verbose = 0;
00057 int debug = 0;
00058 
00059 char hostname[1024];
00060 
00061 struct timeval t1, t2;
00062 
00063 char *timestamp() {
00064         static char datestring[80];
00065         time_t timestamp;
00066 
00067         fflush(stdout);
00068         timestamp = time(NULL);
00069         strftime(datestring, 80, "%T", localtime(&timestamp));
00070 
00071         return datestring;
00072 }
00073 
00074 inline void begin(char *str) {
00075         if (verbose > 0 && rank == 0) {
00076                 gettimeofday(&t1, NULL);
00077                 printf("%s:\tBeginning %s\n", timestamp(), str);
00078                 fflush(stdout);
00079         }
00080 }
00081 
00082 inline void end(char *str) {
00083         float elapsed;
00084 
00085         MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00086         if (verbose > 0 && rank == 0) {
00087                 gettimeofday(&t2, NULL);
00088 
00089                 elapsed = t2.tv_sec - t1.tv_sec +
00090                           (float)(t2.tv_usec-t1.tv_usec)/1000000;
00091                 if (elapsed >= 60) {
00092                         printf("%s:\tFinished %-15s(%.2f min)\n",
00093                                timestamp(), str, elapsed / 60);
00094                 } else {
00095                         printf("%s:\tFinished %-15s(%.3f sec)\n",
00096                                timestamp(), str, elapsed);
00097 
00098                 }
00099                 fflush(stdout);
00100         }
00101 }
00102 
00103 void dump_diff(char *orig_buf, char *buf, int size, long _off)
00104 {
00105         int i, diff, off;
00106         char *p, *end;
00107 
00108         printf("commpared buf size %d, at offset %lu\n\n", size, _off);
00109 
00110         if (orig_buf) {
00111                 printf("original buf:\n");
00112                 p = orig_buf;
00113                 end = orig_buf + size;
00114                 i = 1;
00115                 while (p < end) {
00116                         printf(" %8lx", *(long *)p);
00117                         p += sizeof(long);
00118                         if (i++%8 == 0)
00119                                 printf("\n");
00120                 }
00121                 if (i%8) printf("\n\n");
00122                 else printf("\n");
00123         }
00124 
00125         if (buf) {
00126                 printf("different data: diff_data(orig_data)\n");
00127                 diff = 0;
00128                 off = 0;
00129                 i = 1;
00130                 p = buf;
00131                 end = buf + size;
00132                 while (p < end) {
00133                         if (memcmp(p, orig_buf + off, sizeof(long)) != 0) {
00134                                 printf("\toff: %5d,\tdata: %8lx (%8lx)\n", off,
00135                                        *(unsigned long *)p,
00136                                        *(unsigned long *)(orig_buf + off));
00137                                 diff++;
00138                         }
00139                         off += sizeof(long);
00140                         p += sizeof(long);
00141                 }
00142                 printf("\n %d total differents found\n\n", diff);
00143         }
00144 }
00145 
00146 void lp_gethostname(void)
00147 {
00148         if (gethostname(hostname, 1024) == -1) {
00149                 fprintf(stderr, "gethostname: (%d)%s", errno, strerror(errno));
00150                 MPI_Abort(MPI_COMM_WORLD, 2);
00151         }
00152 }
00153 
00154 /* This function does not FAIL if the requested "name" does not exit.
00155  * This is just to clean up any files or directories left over from
00156  * previous runs
00157  */
00158 void remove_file_or_dir(char *name)
00159 {
00160         struct stat statbuf;
00161         char errmsg[MAX_FILENAME_LEN + 20];
00162 
00163         if (stat(name, &statbuf) != -1) {
00164                 if (S_ISREG(statbuf.st_mode)) {
00165                         printf("stale file found\n");
00166                         if (unlink(name) == -1) {
00167                                 sprintf(errmsg, "unlink of %s", name);
00168                                 FAIL(errmsg);
00169                         }
00170                 }
00171                 if (S_ISDIR(statbuf.st_mode)) {
00172                         printf("stale directory found\n");
00173                         if (rmdir(name) == -1) {
00174                                 sprintf(errmsg, "rmdir of %s", name);
00175                                 FAIL(errmsg);
00176                         }
00177                 }
00178         }
00179 }
00180 
00181 void create_file(char *name, long filesize, int fill)
00182 {
00183         static char filename[MAX_FILENAME_LEN];
00184         char errmsg[MAX_FILENAME_LEN + 20];
00185         char buf[1024 * 8];
00186         char c = 'A' + size;
00187         int fd, rc;
00188         short zero = 0;
00189         long left = filesize;
00190 
00191         /* Process 0 creates the test file(s) */
00192         if (rank == 0) {
00193                 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s", testdir, name);
00194                 remove_file_or_dir(filename);
00195                 if ((fd = creat(filename, FILEMODE)) == -1) {
00196                         sprintf(errmsg, "create of file %s", filename);
00197                         FAIL(errmsg);
00198                 }
00199                 if (filesize > 0) {
00200                         if (lseek(fd, filesize - 1, SEEK_SET) == -1) {
00201                                 close(fd);
00202                                 sprintf(errmsg, "lseek of file %s", filename);
00203                                 FAIL(errmsg);
00204                         }
00205                         if (write(fd, &zero, 1) == -1) {
00206                                 close(fd);
00207                                 sprintf(errmsg, "write of file %s", filename);
00208                                 FAIL(errmsg);
00209                         }
00210                 }
00211                 if (filesize > 0 && fill) {
00212                         if (lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET) == -1) {
00213                                 close(fd);
00214                                 sprintf(errmsg, "lseek of file %s", filename);
00215                                 FAIL(errmsg);
00216                         }
00217                         memset(buf, c, 1024);
00218                         while (left > 0) {
00219                                 if ((rc = write(fd, buf,
00220                                                 left > (1024 * 8) ? (1024 * 8) : left))
00221                                     == -1) {
00222                                         close(fd);
00223                                         sprintf(errmsg, "write of file %s", filename);
00224                                         FAIL(errmsg);
00225                                 }
00226                                 left -= rc;
00227                         }
00228                 }
00229                 if (close(fd) == -1) {
00230                         sprintf(errmsg, "close of file %s", filename);
00231                         FAIL(errmsg);
00232                 }
00233         }
00234 }
00235 
00236 void check_stat(char *filename, struct stat *state, struct stat *old_state)
00237 {
00238         char errmsg[MAX_FILENAME_LEN+20];
00239 
00240         if (stat(filename, state) == -1) {
00241                 sprintf(errmsg, "stat of file %s", filename);
00242                 FAIL(errmsg);
00243         }
00244 
00245         if (memcmp(state, old_state, sizeof(struct stat)) != 0) {
00246                 errno = 0;
00247                 sprintf(errmsg, LP_STAT_FMT, LP_STAT_ARGS);
00248                 FAIL(errmsg);
00249         }
00250 }
00251 
00252 void remove_file(char *name)
00253 {
00254         char filename[MAX_FILENAME_LEN];
00255         char errmsg[MAX_FILENAME_LEN + 20];
00256 
00257         /* Process 0 remove the file(s) */
00258         if (rank == 0) {
00259                 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s", testdir, name);
00260                 if (unlink(filename) == -1) {
00261                         sprintf(errmsg, "unlink of file %s", filename);
00262                         FAIL(errmsg);
00263                 }
00264         }
00265 }
00266 
00267 void fill_stride(char *buf, int buf_size, long long rank, long long _off)
00268 {
00269         char *p = buf;
00270         long long off, data[2];
00271         int cp, left = buf_size;
00272 
00273         data[0] = rank;
00274         off = _off;
00275         while (left > 0) {
00276                 data[1] = off;
00277                 cp = left > sizeof(data) ? sizeof(data) : left;
00278                 memcpy(p, data, cp);
00279                 off += cp;
00280                 p += cp;
00281                 left -= cp;
00282         }
00283 }
